Package com.redis.ds.ds_redis.core

Class RedisGrid

java.lang.Object
com.redis.ds.ds_redis.core.RedisGrid
public class RedisGrid extends Object
The RedisGrid class handles Redis database operations centered around DataGrid objects. The Redis operations executed via the Jedis programmatic library. You can instantiate this class from the parent RedisDS class.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole
See Also:
  • OSS Redis Commands
  • Jedis GitHub site
  • Intro to Jedis â€“ the Java Redis Client Library

  • Constructor Details

    • RedisGrid

      public RedisGrid(RedisDS aRedisDS)
      Constructor accepts a Redis data source parameter and initializes the core objects accordingly.
      Parameters:
      aRedisDS - Redis data source instance

  • Method Details

    • updateSchema

      public boolean updateSchema(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aSchemaDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Updates the data items captured in the DataDoc against the schema. The data items must be derived from the schema definition. Note: The data document must designate a data item as a primary key and that value must be assigned prior to using this method.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aSchemaDoc - Data document instance
      Returns:
      true if schema needed to be updated and false otherwise
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis data source related exception

    • exists

      public boolean exists(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid) throws RedisDSException
      Determines if a data grid key already exists in the database.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Returns:
      true if it exists and false otherwise
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • add

      public void add(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid) throws RedisDSException
      Adds a data grid to the Redis database using hashes for each row and a sorted set to capture the row order. The logic automatically handles data items with multiple values (when hashes are used) and performs encryption on the values if the Data.FEATURE_IS_SECRET is enabled.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • add

      public void add(String aKeyName, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Adds the data document as a row to the end of the data grid identified by the key name in the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name of data grid
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • add

      public void add(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Adds the data document as a row to the end of the data grid in the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME. Note: This method does not add the data document instance to the end of the data grid instance. You must reload the data grid from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • getGridSchema

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid> getGridSchema(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Returns an optional data grid schema from the Redis database based on the key name.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      Returns:
      Optional data item instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • getGridData

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid> getGridData(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Returns an optional data grid with row data populated from the Redis database based on the key name.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      Returns:
      Optional data item instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • getRowCount

      public long getRowCount(String aKeyName) throws RedisDSException
      Return the count of rows for the data grid identified by the key name in the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      Returns:
      Row count or -1 if key does not exist
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • getRowCount

      public long getRowCount(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid) throws RedisDSException
      Return the count of rows for the data grid identified by the key name in the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Returns:
      Row count or -1 if key does not exist
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • loadGrid

      public void loadGrid(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, long aRowNumberStart, long aRowNumberFinish) throws RedisDSException
      Loads the data grid rows and columns from the Redis database based on the row start/finish parameters. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME. Note: Any existing rows in the grid will be emptied prior to the load operation.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aRowNumberStart - Row number start (1 - N)
      aRowNumberFinish - Row number finish (1 - N)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • loadGridPipeline

      public void loadGridPipeline(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, long aRowNumberStart, long aRowNumberFinish) throws RedisDSException
      Loads the data grid rows and columns from the Redis database based on the row start/finish parameters. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME. As a network optimization, command pipelining is utilized. Note: Any existing rows in the grid will be emptied prior to the load operation.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aRowNumberStart - Row number start (1 - N)
      aRowNumberFinish - Row number finish (1 - N)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • loadGrid

      public void loadGrid(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid) throws RedisDSException
      Loads the data grid rows and columns from the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME. Note: Any existing rows in the grid will be emptied prior to the load operation. Since streams storage could consist of events with different member fields, it is not supported by this method. Also, geo location is best loaded with specialize distance queries and therefore unsupported with this method.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • getRowAsDoc

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc> getRowAsDoc(String aKeyName, long aRowNumber) throws RedisDSException
      Returns an optional data document instance that represents the row of cells identified by the row number.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      aRowNumber - Row number (1- N)
      Returns:
      Optional data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • getRowAsDoc

      public Optional<com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc> getRowAsDoc(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, int aRowNumber) throws RedisDSException
      Returns an optional data document instance that represents the row of cells identified by the row number. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aRowNumber - Row number (1- N)
      Returns:
      Optional data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • loadGridCommandsFromStream

      public com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid loadGridCommandsFromStream(String aKeyName, String aStartId, String anEndId, int aBatchCount, com.redis.ds.ds_grid.GridDS aDocCmdDS) throws RedisDSException, com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException
      Convenience method that loads Redis commands from a stream and augments the information with Redis command documentation.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name of the command stream
      aStartId - Id of start time range
      anEndId - Id of end time range
      aBatchCount - Batch count size
      aDocCmdDS - Grid data source capturing command documentation
      Returns:
      Data grid instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis Data Source exception
      com.redis.foundation.ds.DSException - Data source exception

    • insert

      public void insert(String aKeyName, int aAfterRowNumber, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Inserts the data document instance in the Redis database after the row number specified. Note: This method does not add the data document instance to the end of the data grid instance. You must reload the data grid from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      aAfterRowNumber - Row number (1 - N) after which the data document should be added
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • insert

      public void insert(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, int aAfterRowNumber, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Inserts the data document instance in the Redis database after the row number specified. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME. Note: This method does not insert the data document instance within the data grid instance. You must reload the data grid from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aAfterRowNumber - Row number (1 - N) after which the data document should be added
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • update

      public void update(String aKeyName, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Updates the row in the data grid identified by the key name and row number with the field/values contained within the data document instance. Note: This method does not update the data document instance within the data grid instance. You must reload the data grid from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • update

      public void update(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, int aRowNumber, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Updates the row in the data grid identified by the key name and row number with the field/values contained within the data document instance. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME. Note: This method does not update the data document instance within the data grid instance. You must reload the data grid from the Redis database.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aRowNumber - Row number (1 - N)
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • memoryUsage

      public long memoryUsage(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid) throws RedisDSException
      Queries Redis for the memory usage (in bytes) of the value data structure identified by the data document.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Returns:
      Memory usage in bytes
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
      See Also:
      • Redis Command

    • delete

      public void delete(String aKeyName, long aRowNumber) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the row identified by the row number from the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME.
      Parameters:
      aKeyName - Key name for data grid
      aRowNumber - Row number (1 - N)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • delete

      public void delete(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, int aRowNumber) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the row identified by the row number from the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aRowNumber - Row number (1 - N)
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • delete

      public void delete(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid, com.redis.foundation.data.DataDoc aDataDoc) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the row identified by the data document instance from the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      aDataDoc - Data document instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure

    • delete

      public void delete(com.redis.foundation.data.DataGrid aDataGrid) throws RedisDSException
      Deletes the data grid instance from the Redis database. The key name is obtained from the * feature Redis.REDIS_FEATURE_KEY_NAME.
      Parameters:
      aDataGrid - Data grid instance
      Throws:
      RedisDSException - Redis operation failure
